foreignData.name: Basris Leutnant
foreignData.text:
Wachsamkeit, Schutz vor allem Mehrfarbigen
Wenn Basris Leutnant ins Spiel kommt, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst.
Immer wenn Basris Leutnant oder eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt und falls eine +1/+1 Marke auf ihm bzw. ihr lag, erzeuge einen 2/2 weißen Ritter-Kreaturenspielstein mit Wachsamkeit.

foreignData.name: Teniente de Basri
foreignData.text:
Vigilancia, protección contra multicolor.
Cuando el Teniente de Basri entre, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo que controlas.
Siempre que el Teniente de Basri u otra criatura que controlas muera, si tenía un contador +1/+1 sobre ella, crea una ficha de criatura Caballero blanca 2/2 con la habilidad de vigilancia.

foreignData.name: Lieutenant de Basri
foreignData.text:
Vigilance, protection contre le multicolore
Quand le Lieutenant de Basri arrive, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez.
À chaque fois que le Lieutenant de Basri ou une autre créature que vous contrôlez meurt, si elle avait un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 blanche Chevalier avec la vigilance.

foreignData.name: Tenente di Basri
foreignData.text:
Cautela, protezione dal multicolore
Quando il Tenente di Basri entra, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio che controlli.
Ogniqualvolta il Tenente di Basri o un'altra creatura che controlli muore, se aveva un segnalino +1/+1, crea una pedina creatura Cavaliere 2/2 bianca con cautela.

foreignData.name: バスリの副官
foreignData.text:
警戒、プロテクション（多色）
バスリの副官が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
バスリの副官か、あなたがコントロールしていてこれでないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、それの上に＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれていた場合、警戒を持つ白の２/２の騎士・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・騎士

mainBoard.name: Basri's Lieutenant
mainBoard.originalText:
Vigilance, protection from multicolored
When Basri's Lieutenant enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever Basri's Lieutenant or another creature you control dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

rulings.text: Basri's Lieutenant can be the target of its own enters-the-battlefield triggered ability.
If Basri's Lieutenant dies at the same time as other creatures, its last ability will trigger for any of the creatures that had a +1/+1 counter on it, including itself.

If a creature with +1/+1 counters on it receives a greater or equal number of -1/-1 counters and this causes it to be destroyed by lethal damage or put into its owner's graveyard for having 0 or less toughness, the last ability triggers. This is because the ability checks the creature as it last existed on the battlefield, and it still had those counters on it at that point.
The second triggered ability of Basri's Lieutenant triggers just once if the dying creature has +1/+1 counters on it, no matter how many of those counters it has.

mainBoard.text:
Vigilance, protection from multicolored
When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, Dromoka-Krieger
foreignData.text:
Wenn Urdnan, Dromoka-Krieger, ins Spiel kommt, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
Immer wenn du angreifst, erhält eine angreifende Kreatur deiner Wahl, auf der eine +1/+1-Marke liegt, Erstschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges. Falls auf jener Kreatur zwei oder mehr +1/+1-Marken liegen, erhält sie stattdessen Doppelschlag bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, guerrero de Drómoka
foreignData.text:
Cuando Urdnan, guerrero de Drómoka entre, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura objetivo.
Siempre que ataques, la criatura atacante objetivo con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella gana la habilidad de dañar primero hasta el final del turno. Si esa criatura tiene dos o más contadores +1/+1 sobre ella, en vez de eso, gana la habilidad de dañar dos veces hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, guerrier de Dromoka
foreignData.text:
Quand Urdnan, guerrier de Dromola arrive, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur une créature ciblée.
À chaque fois que vous attaquez, une créature attaquante ciblée avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle acquiert l'initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour. Si cette créature a au moins deux marqueurs +1/+1 sur elle, elle acquiert la double initiative jusqu'à la fin du tour à la place.

foreignData.name: Urdnan, Guerriero Dromoka
foreignData.text:
Quando Urdnan, Guerriero Dromoka entra, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su una creatura bersaglio.
Ogniqualvolta attacchi, una creatura attaccante bersaglio con un segnalino +1/+1 ha attacco improvviso fino alla fine del turno. Se quella creatura ha due o più segnalini +1/+1, ha invece doppio attacco fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: ドロモカの戦士、ウルドナン
foreignData.text:
ドロモカの戦士、ウルドナンが戦場に出たとき、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
あなたが攻撃するたび、＋１/＋１カウンターが置かれている攻撃クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは先制攻撃を得る。そのクリーチャーの上に２個以上の＋１/＋１カウンターがあるなら、代わりに、ターン終了時まで、それは二段攻撃を得る。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・戦士

mainBoard.name: Urdnan, Dromoka Warrior
mainBoard.originalText:

Whenever you attack, target attacking creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains first strike until end of turn. If that creature has two or more +1/+1 counters on it, it gains double strike until end of turn instead.

mainBoard.name: Banishing Light
mainBoard.originalText: When Banishing Light enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist. When the card returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the card that was exiled.
If Banishing Light leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the target permanent won't be exiled.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

If an Aura is exiled this way, its owner chooses what it will enchant as it returns to the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way doesn't target anything (so it could be attached to a permanent with shroud, for example), but the Aura's enchant ability restricts what it can be attached to. If the Aura can't legally be attached to anything, it remains in exile for the rest of the game.

mainBoard.text: When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

rulings.text: If a mode requires a target and there are no legal targets available, that mode can't be chosen. You must choose another mode if able.

foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

mainBoard.name: Star Pupil
mainBoard.originalText:
Star Pupil enters with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Star Pupil dies, put its counters on target creature you control.

rulings.text: If Star Pupil has -1/-1 counters on it when it dies, the last ability will include those as well. This may result in the recipient also dying.

In some unusual cases, you may end up putting the appropriate counters on more than one permanent. For example, if you control The Ozolith when Star Pupil dies, you will put the appropriate number of each kind of counter onto both The Ozolith and the target creature.
Star Pupil puts all of its counters onto the target creature, not just its +1/+1 counters.
Star Pupil's ability doesn't cause you to move counters from itself to the target creature. Rather, you put the same number of each kind of counter Star Pupil had when it died onto that creature.
